document.full_text: spaniard sergio garcia was in danger of becoming golf's forgotten man but he could just be hitting form in time for a title shot at the u.s. masters next month.
document.title: resurgent sergio garcia finally finding the feeling
lines_and_colors: spaniard sergio garcia was in danger of becoming golf's forgotten man but he could just be hitting form in time for a title shot at the u.s. masters next month.
